title: Discovery of India by Indians is an exciting opportunity: Hyatt CEO Mark Hoplamazian
description: Hyatt Hotels' CEO Mark Hoplamazian is optimistic about India's hospitality market, noting the country's discovery by Indian travelers. With 48 hotels in India and plans for 50 more, including in Goa and Bengaluru, Hyatt aims to tap into India's growing leisure and spiritual travel sectors. Hoplamazian sees potential in brands like JdV and Unbound Collection. Despite global challenges, Hyatt's focus on high-end travelers and wellbeing services has led to record earnings and a robust pipeline, with India playing a key role in its growth strategy.
